content:
Hi there, I just wanted to post a bundle with some resources. one of them is a custom resource (with an own defined resource type). unfortunatelly the resourceprovider does not fill the fields of the bundle entry with the custom resource. is this not supported? all other operations (CRUDS) work with the custom resource (and resource type)
- forget it, i forgot to wrap it inside a ‘resource’ element. works =)
